title: sOmanai aNipera
sahitya:
sOmanai aNipera shUDiya perumAnE kAmanai erittAi kaN mAyam sheidIrE


anupallavi

  tImunaik-kaNNanE cintai tuLaipaDavE bhUmunai sharangaLaip-pOkkiyadAr sholvIr


caraNam    karuNai shuvai tarum karpakak-kaniyE kalandunaik-kUDumun kaDuntuyar tIrumO 
aruNanudayam pOnra azhagavizh mEniyir aruLuDan madananai azhittiDa varuvIr
